column4: man, trying to get ubuntu to natively use windows shit is a pain
you can make .net work , by wine scripts, but not directx
no, I'm trying to code it into the system
basically, a couple of people i know want to migrate to linux with the exception of typing anything in a command line ever
so I'm trying to get ubuntu to basically run it out of the box
I'll have to test evolution for exchange, some people are so set in their ways, though, so IDK.
It is not that expensive and works fine for your need, they should buy it I spouse,
